about_the_game:
[Welcome to The Unknown]

  • The Unknown is the world's first professional ghost hunting organization. Problem is, the organization is surrounded in mysteries and unanswered questions. They supply the equipment, you complete contracts, and get paid. Best to keep it that way. The Unknown is always watching.

[Ghost Hunting Contracts]

  • Tasked by The Unknown, use your arsenal of ghost hunting equipment to take on terrifying Contracts that will test your bravery at every corner. First, identify the ghost type, then follow your specialized phone's guidance and tools to fight back and exorcise the evil entities.

[Unlockables]

  • Upon joining The Unknown, you'll be provided a special phone that allows you to enter evidence, retrieve exorcism steps, monitor temperature, remotely trigger decoys, and more. As you complete contracts, you'll earn experience and unlock maps and ghost types, along with equipment and apps that can be bought from the in-game store with money earned from contracts.

[Customization]

  • Personalize your appearance with over 40 facial sliders and hundreds of clothing options to choose from. Go for a gorgeous beauty or a randomized freak, the possibilities are endless and the choice is yours.

[Level Editor]

  • Design and share your own custom locations using the built-in Level Editor, or download and play unique contracts created by others from the Steam Workshop.

[VR Support]

  • Play in VR for extra fun.

content_descriptors.notes: The ghosts' sudden actions or appearance may be frightening to some players.

detailed_description:
[Welcome to The Unknown]

  • The Unknown is the world's first professional ghost hunting organization. Problem is, the organization is surrounded in mysteries and unanswered questions. They supply the equipment, you complete contracts, and get paid. Best to keep it that way. The Unknown is always watching.

[Ghost Hunting Contracts]

  • Tasked by The Unknown, use your arsenal of ghost hunting equipment to take on terrifying Contracts that will test your bravery at every corner. First, identify the ghost type, then follow your specialized phone's guidance and tools to fight back and exorcise the evil entities.

[Unlockables]

  • Upon joining The Unknown, you'll be provided a special phone that allows you to enter evidence, retrieve exorcism steps, monitor temperature, remotely trigger decoys, and more. As you complete contracts, you'll earn experience and unlock maps and ghost types, along with equipment and apps that can be bought from the in-game store with money earned from contracts.

[Customization]

  • Personalize your appearance with over 40 facial sliders and hundreds of clothing options to choose from. Go for a gorgeous beauty or a randomized freak, the possibilities are endless and the choice is yours.

[Level Editor]

  • Design and share your own custom locations using the built-in Level Editor, or download and play unique contracts created by others from the Steam Workshop.

[VR Support]

  • Play in VR for extra fun.
name: Paranatural

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-7400 / Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Vulkan-Supported GPU
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700k / Ryzen 5 3500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 Super / RX 5700-XT
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: Welcome to The Unknown, Ghost Hunter! Hauntings are on the rise, and it's your chance to put a stop to them! Team up with fellow ghost hunters or go solo as you identify and exorcise a slew of highly intelligent and sinister entities. Can you survive the Paranatural?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Hindi
*languages with full audio support
